locations.name: Hogwarts
locations.description: Hogwarts is the magical school that Harry and his friends attend. It is described as a castle with corridors, classrooms, and the Great Hall.

locations.name: Great Hall
locations.description: The Great Hall is where the students have their meals and gather for special events. It is described as having long tables and floating candles.

locations.name: Quidditch field
locations.description: The Quidditch field is where the students play the game of Quidditch. It is described as having golden poles with hoops and seats for the spectators.

locations.name: Girls' bathroom
locations.description: The girls' bathroom is where Hermione is cornered by the troll. It is described as a place where the troll knocks the sinks off the walls.

locations.name: Corridor
locations.description: The corridor is where Harry and his friends encounter the troll and hide from it. It is described as being crowded with confused Hufflepuffs.

scenes.textStartsWith: As the owls flooded into the Great Hall as usual, everyone’s attention was caught at once by a long, thin package carried by six large screech owls.
They left the hall quickly, wanting to unwrap the broomstick in private before their first class, but halfway across the entrance hall they found the way upstairs barred by Crabbe and Goyle.
As seven o’clock drew nearer, Harry left the castle and set off in the dusk toward the Quidditch field.
“So I suppose you think that’s a reward for breaking rules?” came an angry voice from just behind them. Hermione was stomping up the stairs, looking disapprovingly at the package in Harry’s hand.
Too eager to fly again to wait for Wood, Harry mounted his broomstick and kicked off from the ground.
On Halloween morning they woke to the delicious smell of baking pumpkin wafting through the corridors.
Someone knocked into Harry as they hurried past him. It was Hermione.
The common room was packed and noisy. Everyone was eating the food that had been sent up.

characters.name: Harry Potter
characters.description: Harry is the main protagonist of the book. He is described as having messy black hair and glasses.

characters.name: Ron Weasley
characters.description: Ron is Harry's best friend. He is described as having red hair and freckles.

characters.name: Draco Malfoy
characters.description: Malfoy is Harry's rival. He is described as having blonde hair and a sneering expression.

characters.name: Oliver Wood
characters.description: Oliver is the Quidditch team captain. He is described as being enthusiastic about Quidditch.

characters.name: Hermione Granger
characters.description: Hermione is Harry and Ron's friend. She is described as being bossy and a know-it-all.

characters.name: Professor Quirrell
characters.description: Professor Quirrell is a teacher at Hogwarts. He is described as having a turban askew and a terrified expression.

characters.name: Professor Snape
characters.description: Professor Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts. He is described as giving Harry a piercing look.

characters.name: Professor McGonagall
characters.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts. She is described as being angry and disappointed.

characters.name: Professor Dumbledore
characters.description: Professor Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts. He is described as being informed of the events.
